## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.expandAll() method

Expands all accordion items.

Calls `toggleAll` with `true` to open all items. Does nothing if the accordion type is "Single".


**Signature:**

```typescript
expandAll(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void

{<!-- -->void<!-- -->}
